About him

Haijian Liu, used to worked as a designer for years, however now is on his new advanture as a game developer based in Tokyo Japan.

He got a double talents in both art and sicence and is always trying to make things more beautiful and functional.

If you’d like to work with him on a project together, don’t hesitate to get in touch!
